summary: Uber is a huge American company that offers various services like taxi rides, food delivery, and package shipping. It works in many countries and cities, making it the world's top ride-sharing service. With millions of users and drivers, Uber makes a lot of money, but it has faced legal issues. The company calls its drivers independent workers, which means they don't get the same benefits as regular employees. Uber has also been in trouble for causing traffic problems and not following local rules.
title: Uber
